buildings.name: Cartography Table
buildings.description: Chart maps and discover new locations. Cartographers reveal hidden areas.

tiers.flavorText: Map knowledge helps you sidestep attacks.
Escape routes make you hard to hit.
Escape routes double as attack vectors.
Expert navigation blinds enemies on crits.
Escape routes lead to cleansing waters.
Slaying enemies reveals shadowy hiding spots.
Dungeon maps show basic emergency exits.
Secret passages grant multiple escapes from death.
